author: vines
msg: Accumulo-459 - Zookeeper is made to recheck on failure, so detecting failure is a bit more difficult. However, that doesn't mean we can't be informative for the user if it's not availabile.

author: carlucci
msg: removed comparision of class type in equals method as it is too restrictive when comparing against classes extended from User

author: andy
msg: Change email addresess to the TLP lists

author: acoburn
msg: The "no image" image is inserted into the image table as id=1, but the resource table is pre-built with the expectation that the "no image"
id=4. The resource table is now populated with an id=1 for "no image".
